Texts.Chs: 把^orange;增强铠甲^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I need to dress a pleasure doll to look exactly like ^green;a coworkers mother^reset;... Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? I suck at sewing, and I'll pay you. Shh!
Now for phase two! Thanks for the help. He'll never see it coming!
